scripts.doloc-fr: curl https://api.doloc.io -H "Authorization: Bearer $API_TOKEN" -F source="@src/lang/en.json" -F target="@src/lang/fr.json" -o src/lang/fr.json
scripts.doloc-fr-win: curl https://api.doloc.io -H "Authorization: Bearer %API_TOKEN%" -F source="@src/lang/en.json" -F target="@src/lang/fr.json" -o src/lang/fr.json
scripts.update-i18n: npm run extract-en && npm run doloc-fr && npm run format-js-compile-en && npm run format-js-compile-fr
scripts.update-i18n-win: npm run extract-en && npm run doloc-fr-win && npm run format-js-compile-en && npm run format-js-compile-fr
